Translations.Text: Vidklykannya shcho my vzyaly z prorokiv yikhnya domovlenistʹ, vklyuchayuchy vas (O Muhammad), Noah, Abraham, Moses, ta Isus syn Mary. My vzyaly z nykh urochysta zastava
Z·hodom, Vin bezsumnivno dopytaye pravdyvyy pro yikhniy truthfulness, ta maye hotovyy do disbelievers (u tsʹomu Quranic fakti) bolisnyy retribution
O vy shcho vvazhayete, pam'yatayete BOZHE blahoslovennya na vas; koly soldaty atakuvaly vas, my poslaly na nykh nasylʹnytsʹkyy viter ta nevydymi soldaty. BOH Seer vse vy
Koly vony prybuly zverkhu vy, ta z vnyzu vas, vashi ochi strakhalysʹ, vashi serdenʹka vytratyly terpinnya, ta vy harbored unbefitting dumky pro BOHA
Tse - koly viruyuchi spravdi buly vyprobovani; vony suvoro trusylysʹ
lytsemiry ta tsi z sumnivamy u yikhnikh serdenʹkakh skazaly, "Yakyy BOH ta Yoho kur'yer poobitsyav nam ne buv bilʹsh nizh ilyuziya

hrupa z nykh skazala, "O lyudy Yathrib, vy ne mozhete dosyahnuty peremohy; poyidʹte nazad." Inshi sklaly probachennya do proroka: "Nashi domivky vmiyutʹ vrazlyvi, koly vony buly ne vrazlyvi. Vony tilʹky zakhotily utikty
Maly voroha zakhopyly ta poprosyly yikh pryyednatysya, vony by pryyednalysya do voroha bez vahannya
Vony zastavyly do BOHA ranishe,, kotri vony povernutʹsya navkolo ta tikayutʹ; ukladennya zastavy z BOHOM vklyuchaye velyku vidpovidalʹnistʹ
